headline: Ryan Announces Minority Investment from Neuberger Berman Capital Solutions
summary: PLANO, Texas & NEW YORK, January 14, 2026--Ryan, LLC ("Ryan" or the "Company"), a leading global tax services and software provider, announced today Neuberger Berman Capital Solutions, along with funds managed by Neuberger Berman Private Markets (collectively, "Neuberger"), has committed to acquiring a significant minority equity interest in Ryan.
